page.title: 17Opinions of St.Ouen's folk.
page.content: We asked an English person why do you live in St.Ouen she replied "because St.Ouen is the most picturesque parish with rolling hills and beautiful countryside." We then asked for a comparison between England and St.Ouen , she replied "The pace of life is far slower then most places in England and far more relaxed.The people are very friendly.I also think the standard of living is better." We then asked 86 year old Mr.J. Le Gresley who has lived in St.Ouen all his life, if St. Ouens has changed very much in his lifetime. He thinks there is now a lot more houses than there used to be. He also thinks St. Ouen has become much busier,the roads have improved a great deal but there are also many more cars than there used to be. He also thinks there are many more English people living here.
